maqras.text: So there was no answer from his nation except that they said: “Drive out the family of Lout from your town. Verily, they are humans who remain clean and sanctified.”
So We saved him and his household except his wife. We destined her to be of those who buried themselves under dust and debris
And We rained down over them a rain (of stones). So evil became the rain cast over those who were warned (in advance)
Say: “Selective Praise suits Allah (Alone), and peace be upon His Ibad whom He selected and chose (for His Message). Is Allah better, or (all) that they ascribe as partners (to Allah)?”

Is That One Who created the heavens and the earth and sent down for you water from towards the sky (better or other gods)? So We brought forth therewith orchards full of beauty and delight. It is not for you that you may grow the trees thereof. Is there any ilah (god) alongwith Allah? Nay, they are a nation who ascribe equals (to Him)

Is That One Who has made the earth as a place of stay and has placed in its midst, rivers and has placed in its interest mountains (which give it stability of motion), and has set between two seas a barrier (which keeps the sweet and salt water as separate collections) — is there any ilah alongwith Allah? Nay, most of them know not

Is That One Who responds to the distressed one when he called Him, and removes the evil and makes you settling-successors on the earth — is there any ilah alongwith Allah? Little is that which you remind (yourself or remind the others)

Is the One Who guides you in the darknesses of the land and the sea, and Who sends the winds as heralds of glad tidings between the two hands (i.e., just prior to) His Mercy (i.e., the rains) — is there any ilah alongwith Allah? Allah became Exalted above all that they associate as partners (to Him)

Is the One Who originates creation and shall thereafter repeat it; and Who provides provisions to you from the heavens as well as the earth — is there any ilah alongwith Allah? Say (to the polytheists): “Bring your proof if you are truthfull.”
Say: “Does not know, whosoever is in the heavens and the earth — al-ghaib except Allah; and they perceive not when they shall be resurrected.”
Nay, their knowledge went in vain regarding the Hereafter; nay, they are in doubt about it; nay, they are (rather) blind to it
And those who have disbelieved said: “What, when we have become dust, and our fathers, shall we indeed, surely be brought out people (from our burial sites)
Truly, indeed we were promised this — we, and our fathers, since before; it is not but writings of the earlier people.”
Say, “Travel in the earth and see how (evil) was the final end of the criminals.”
And do not grieve for them, and do not be in distress under effect of that what they plot
And they say: “When will this promise (be fulfilled), if you are truthful
Say: "Some of that which you wish to hasten on: may be that it becomes attached to you (already, in this world)
And verily, your Nourisher-Sustainer is indeed Possessor of Grace for mankind, yet most of them do not pay thanks
And verily, your Nourisher-Sustainer surely knows what their chests conceal and what they reveal
And there is not a thing hidden in the heaven or the earth but (it is) in a clear Record
Verily, this Al-Quran narrates to Bani Israiel most of that which they: therein they differ
And verily, it is surely Hudah and Rahmah for the Believers
Verily, your Nourisher-Sustainer will decide between them by Hukmehi (His Judgment). And He is the All-Mighty, the All-Knowing
So put your trust in Allah, surely you are on Al-Haqq-ul-Mobin
Verily, you do not make the dead to hear, and you do not make the deaf to hear to the call, when they fled turning their backs
And you (are) not (that) who guides the blind inspite of their persistence in ignorance and error. You do not make one hear (the Message) except that who Believes in Our Ayaat, so they are Muslims
